scripts.dev:libs: pnpm -r --parallel --stream --filter json2pptx-schema --filter json2pptx --filter ppt2json --filter pptx-previewer --filter pptx-custom run dev:watch
scripts.dev:workspace: pnpm -r --parallel --stream --filter json2ppt-editor --filter json2pptx-schema --filter json2pptx --filter ppt2json --filter pptx-previewer --filter pptx-custom run dev:watch
scripts.predev: pnpm -C src/lib/json2pptx-schema build && pnpm -C src/lib/json2pptx build && pnpm -C src/lib/pptx2json build && pnpm -C src/lib/pptx-previewer build && pnpm -C src/lib/pptx-custom build
scripts.prebuild: pnpm -C src/lib/json2pptx-schema install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C src/lib/json2pptx-schema build && pnpm -C src/lib/json2pptx install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C src/lib/json2pptx build && pnpm -C src/lib/pptx2json install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C src/lib/pptx2json build && pnpm -C src/lib/pptx-previewer install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C src/lib/pptx-previewer build && pnpm -C src/lib/pptx-custom install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C src/lib/pptx-custom build
